string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it\'s how we behave while we\'re waiting
No act of kindness, however small, is wasted
Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can - there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did
Positive culture comes from being mindful, and respecting your coworkers, and being empathetic
Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for
Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses
Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it
What separates privilege from entitlement is gratitude
